name: The Stranger
summary_text: Follows the lives of suburban families whose secrets and lies are made public by the appearance of a stranger.

name: Run the World
summary_text: Four best friends living in Harlem strive for world domination.

name: Escape from New York
summary_text: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

name: Ghostbusters: Answer the Call
summary_text: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

name: Love
summary_text: A program that follows a couple who must navigate the exhilarations and humiliations of intimacy, commitment and other things they were hoping to avoid.

name: Hell or High Water
summary_text: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

name: Gone with the Wind
summary_text: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

name: Boston Legal
summary_text: Boston Legal is a spin-off of the long-running David E. Kelley series The Practice (1997), following the exploits of former Practice character Alan Shore (James Spader) at the legal firm of Crane, Poole, and Schmidt.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
summary_text: Two siblings and three of their friends en route to visit their grandfather's grave in Texas fall victim to a family of cannibalistic psychopaths.

name: Resident Evil: Infinite Darkness
summary_text: Federal agent Leon S. Kennedy teams up with TerraSave staff member Claire Redfield to investigate a zombie outbreak. Based on the popular video game series of the same name by Capcom.

name: Miami Vice
summary_text: Resplendent with authentic 1980s music, fashion, and vibe, "Miami Vice" follows two undercover detectives and their extended team through the mean streets of Miami, Florida.

name: Deep Blue Sea
summary_text: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease, a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the prey, as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

name: Dallas Buyers Club
summary_text: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

name: Weird Science
summary_text: Two high school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, but she turns their lives upside down.

name: Good Time
summary_text: After a botched bank robbery lands his younger brother in prison, Connie Nikas embarks on a twisted odyssey through New York City's underworld to get his brother Nick out of jail.

name: Labyrinth
summary_text: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth.

name: Blue Valentine
summary_text: The relationship of a contemporary married couple, charting their evolution over a span of years by cross-cutting between time periods.

name: The Kid Detective
summary_text: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 32, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries between hangovers and bouts of self-pity. Until a naive client brings him his first 'adult' case, to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

name: The Master
summary_text: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader.

name: Love Life
summary_text: Anna Kendrick stars in a fresh take on a romantic comedy anthology series about the journey from first love to lasting love.

name: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
summary_text: Eternia's Prince Adam discovers the power of Grayskull and transforms into He-Man, Master of the Universe. A reimagining of the classic animated series.

name: Gwimul
summary_text: The story of two fearless men who are willing to go through extreme lengths in their pursuit of a returning serial killer. To uncover the murderer's identity, the two are forced to look deeper than what the evidence seems to suggest.

name: The Rock
summary_text: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
summary_text: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

name: Norbit
summary_text: A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

name: Death Wish
summary_text: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

name: Doctor Who
summary_text: The adventures in time and space of the Doctor, a Time Lord who changes appearance and personality by regenerating when near death, and is joined by companions in battles against aliens and other megalomaniacs.

name: Monster
summary_text: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

name: Moonrise Kingdom
summary_text: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

name: Platoon
summary_text: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

name: Atomic Blonde
summary_text: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

name: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
summary_text: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

name: Fantasy Island
summary_text: When the owner and operator of a luxurious island invites a collection of guests to live out their most elaborate fantasies in relative seclusion, chaos quickly descends.

name: The Descent
summary_text: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

name: WALL·E
summary_text: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

name: Joey
summary_text: In this spin-off of Friends (1994), Joey Tribbiani moves to Los Angeles to pursue his acting career.

name: Spider-Man 2
summary_text: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

name: Blazing Saddles
summary_text: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

name: 21 Jump Street
summary_text: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

name: I Am Legend
summary_text: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

name: The Virgin Suicides
summary_text: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.

name: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
summary_text: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy from the perspective of Liz, his longtime girlfriend, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.

name: The Last Ship
summary_text: The crew of a naval destroyer is forced to confront the reality of a new existence when a pandemic kills off most of the earth's population.

name: Blank Check
summary_text: After a bike accident, a young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters to whom it belongs are in pursuit.

name: Tusk
summary_text: A brash and arrogant podcaster gets more than he bargained for when he travels to Canada to interview a mysterious recluse... who has a rather disturbing fondness for walruses.

name: Only Lovers Left Alive
summary_text: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. Though their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

name: Preacher
summary_text: After a supernatural event at his church, a preacher enlists the help of a vampire and his ex to find God.

name: Bone Tomahawk
summary_text: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

name: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
summary_text: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

name: Kick-Ass 2
summary_text: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything he stands for.

name: King Kong
summary_text: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

name: The Matrix Reloaded
summary_text: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

name: Cursed
summary_text: A teenage sorceress named Nimue encounters a young Arthur on her quest to find a powerful and ancient sword.

name: A League of Their Own
summary_text: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

name: Jigsaw
summary_text: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for over 10 years.

name: Dumb and Dumber
summary_text: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

name: Night at the Museum
summary_text: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

name: Girl, Interrupted
summary_text: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.

name: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
summary_text: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

name: Siren
summary_text: A coastal town known for its legend of once being home to mermaids is turned upside down when a mysterious girl appears and begins wreaking havoc.

name: The Gloaming
summary_text: When an unidentified woman is found brutally murdered, Detective Molly McGee teams up with fellow cop, Alex O'Connell, with whom she shares a tragic past, to solve the crime.

name: Yes Day
summary_text: A mom and dad who usually say no decide to say yes to their kids' wildest requests with a few ground rules on a whirlwind day of fun and adventure.

name: Alice in Borderland
summary_text: A group of bored delinquents are transported to a parallel wasteland as part of a survival game.

name: Five Feet Apart
summary_text: A pair of teenagers with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, though their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.

name: Jurassic Park III
summary_text: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

name: Hancock
summary_text: Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.

name: Rabid
summary_text: The quiet Rose works in women's fashion clothing, hoping to be a designer. A traffic accident damages her face. She gets experimental stem cell treatment, leaving her stronger and prettier than ever - but there's a side effect.

name: Dogma
summary_text: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

name: Shot Caller
summary_text: A newly released prisoner is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.

name: The Upside
summary_text: A comedic look at the relationship between a wealthy man with quadriplegia and an unemployed man with a criminal record who's hired to help him.

name: What We Do in the Shadows
summary_text: Viago, Deacon and Vladislav are vampires who are finding that modern life has them struggling with the mundane - like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

name: Reign of Fire
summary_text: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

name: The Mummy
summary_text: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

name: Coraline
summary_text: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
summary_text: Number one NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

name: Movie 43
summary_text: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.

name: The Office
summary_text: The story of an office that faces closure when the company decides to downsize its branches. A documentary film crew follow staff and the manager David Brent as they continue their daily lives.

name: The Deer Hunter
summary_text: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

name: Hannibal
summary_text: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

name: Gone in 60 Seconds
summary_text: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.
A high school teacher travels back in time to prevent John F. Kennedy's assassination.

name: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
summary_text: A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

name: The Count of Monte Cristo
summary_text: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

name: Moxie
summary_text: Inspired by her mom's rebellious past and a confident new friend, a shy 16-year-old publishes an anonymous zine calling out sexism at her school.

name: The Kissing Booth
summary_text: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

name: Clear and Present Danger
summary_text: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

name: The Order
summary_text: Out to avenge his mother's death, a college student pledges to a secret order and lands in a war between werewolves and practitioners of dark magic.

name: Fauda
summary_text: The human stories on both sides of the Israel-Palestine conflict.

name: Gangs of New York
summary_text: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
summary_text: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

name: Search Party
summary_text: Search Party is a dark comedy about four self-absorbed twenty-somethings who become entangled in an ominous mystery when a former college acquaintance suddenly disappears.

name: Spenser Confidential
summary_text: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate, Hawk, to take down criminals.

name: Taskmaster
summary_text: Five comedians are set tasks challenging their creativity and wit. The tasks are supervised by Alex Horne but the Taskmaster, Greg Davies, always has the final word.

name: Dredd
summary_text: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

name: Time After Time
summary_text: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

name: Monsters vs. Aliens
summary_text: A woman transformed into a giant after she is struck by a meteorite on her wedding day becomes part of a team of monsters sent in by the U.S. government to defeat an alien mastermind trying to take over Earth.

name: Inside Man
summary_text: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
summary_text: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

name: Mannequin
summary_text: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

name: Accepted
summary_text: A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

name: It
summary_text: In 1960, seven pre-teen outcasts fight an evil demon who poses as a child-killing clown. Thirty years later, they reunite to stop the demon once and for all when it returns to their hometown.

name: Jerry Maguire
summary_text: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

name: Pieces of a Woman
summary_text: When a young mother's home birth ends in unfathomable tragedy, she begins a year-long odyssey of mourning that fractures relationships with loved ones in this deeply personal story of a woman learning to live alongside her loss.

name: Gilligan's Island
summary_text: Seven men and women are stranded on an uncharted island following a torrential storm.

name: Little Miss Sunshine
summary_text: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

name: The Florida Project
summary_text: Set over one summer, the film follows precocious six-year-old Moonee as she courts mischief and adventure with her ragtag playmates and bonds with her rebellious but caring mother, all while living in the shadows of Walt Disney World.

name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
summary_text: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

name: Edward Scissorhands
summary_text: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.

name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
summary_text: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

name: Shtisel
summary_text: The life of the Shtisel family, a haredi family in Jerusalem.

name: Holes
summary_text: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

name: Serenity
summary_text: A fishing boat captain juggles facing his mysterious past and finding himself ensnared in a reality where nothing is what it seems.

name: Masters of Sex
summary_text: Drama about the pioneers of the science of human sexuality whose research touched off the sexual revolution.

name: Incredibles 2
summary_text: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

name: Contact
summary_text: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

name: Undercover
summary_text: Inspired by real events, undercover agents infiltrate a drug kingpin's operation by posing as a couple at the campground where he spends his weekends.

name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
summary_text: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

name: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
summary_text: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

name: The Durrells
summary_text: Based on the real-life events of the Durrell family as they resettle from England to Greece.

name: The Bad Batch
summary_text: In a desert dystopia, a young woman is kidnapped by cannibals.

name: Legend
summary_text: Identical twin gangsters Ronald and Reginald Kray terrorize London during the 1960s.

name: Workaholics
summary_text: A single-camera comedy featuring three friends who work together as telemarketers from 9 to 5, and live together from 5 to 9.

name: Mary Poppins
summary_text: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

name: The Call of the Wild
summary_text: A sled dog struggles for survival in the wilds of the Yukon.

name: Lone Survivor
summary_text: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

name: The Dirt
summary_text: Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.

name: The Package
summary_text: When a group of teenage friends go on a spring break camping trip, an unfortunate accident sets off a race against time to save their friend's most prized possession.

name: Descendants
summary_text: The teenage son of the king and queen of Auradon offers the trouble-making children of villains a chance to attend prep school in the kingdom.

name: Vinland Saga
summary_text: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

name: 3 Idiots
summary_text: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary_text: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

name: Big Hero 6
summary_text: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

name: Murder Mystery
summary_text: A New York cop and his wife go on a European vacation to reinvigorate the spark in their marriage, but end up getting framed and on the run for the death of an elderly billionaire.

name: The Lincoln Lawyer
summary_text: A lawyer defending a wealthy man begins to believe his client is guilty of more than just one crime.

name: This Is Spinal Tap
summary_text: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

name: Mulan
summary_text: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
summary_text: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

name: Spring Breakers
summary_text: Four college girls hold up a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation. While partying, drinking, and taking drugs, they are arrested, only to be bailed out by a drug and arms dealer.

name: The Hunt for Red October
summary_text: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine Captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

name: The Fighter
summary_text: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

name: Wicked
summary_text: Ivy Morgan, a college student in New Orleans, falls for Ren Owens, the last person she expected to enter her rigidly controlled life. Based on the novel 'Wicked' by Jennifer L. Armentrout.

name: Bad Teacher
summary_text: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job, her students, and her co-workers is forced to return to teaching to make enough money for breast implants after her wealthy fiancé dumps her.

name: Hot Tub Time Machine
summary_text: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.

name: Geostorm
summary_text: When the network of satellites designed to control the global climate starts to attack Earth, it's a race against the clock for its creator to uncover the real threat before a worldwide Geostorm wipes out everything and everyone.

name: To Die For
summary_text: A beautiful but naïve aspiring television personality films a documentary on teenagers with a darker ulterior motive.

name: The Circle
summary_text: A woman lands a dream job at a powerful tech company called the Circle, only to uncover an agenda that will affect the lives of all of humanity.

name: Pride and Prejudice
summary_text: While the arrival of wealthy gentlemen sends her marriage-minded mother into a frenzy, willful and opinionated Elizabeth Bennet matches wits with haughty Mr. Darcy.

name: Into the Woods
summary_text: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

name: Primal Fear
summary_text: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

name: The Royal Tenenbaums
summary_text: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

name: French Exit
summary_text: An aging Manhattan socialite living on what's barely left of her inheritance moves to a small apartment in Paris with her son and cat.

name: Charlie's Angels
summary_text: A wealthy mystery man named Charlie runs a detective agency via a speakerphone and his personal assistant, John Bosley. His detectives are three beautiful women, who end up in a variety of difficult situations.

name: A Streetcar Named Desire
summary_text: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.

name: The Djinn
summary_text: A mute boy is trapped in his apartment with a sinister monster when he makes a wish to fulfill his heart's greatest desire.

name: Topkapi
summary_text: A conman gets mixed up with a group of thieves who plan to rob an Istanbul museum to steal a jewelled dagger.

name: Cats
summary_text: A tribe of cats called the Jellicles must decide yearly which one will ascend to the Heaviside Layer and come back to a new Jellicle life.

name: Ron's Gone Wrong
summary_text: The story of Barney, an awkward middle-schooler and Ron, his new walking, talking, digitally-connected device. Ron's malfunctions set against the backdrop of the social media age launch them on a journey to learn about true friendship.

name: Waiting...
summary_text: Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

name: I May Destroy You
summary_text: The question of sexual consent in contemporary life and how, in the new landscape of dating and relationships, we make the distinction between liberation and exploitation.

name: It Follows
summary_text: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after a sexual encounter.

name: Closer
summary_text: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

name: Malignant
summary_text: Original horror thriller from director James Wan.

name: Vanquish
summary_text: A mother, Victoria, is trying to put her dark past as a Russian drug courier behind her, but retired cop Damon forces Victoria to do his bidding by holding her daughter hostage.

name: Color Out of Space
summary_text: A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.

name: Moulin Rouge!
summary_text: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets.

name: Space Force
summary_text: The people tasked with creating a sixth branch of the armed services: The Space Force.

name: Bring It On
summary_text: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

name: DuckTales
summary_text: The comedy-adventure series chronicles the high-flying adventures of trillionaire Scrooge McDuck, his grandnephews - Huey, Dewey, and Louie - and temperamental nephew Donald Duck, Launchpad McQuack, Mrs. Beakley, and her granddaughter Webby.

name: The Forgotten Battle
summary_text: 1944, the Second World War. A British glider pilot, a Dutch boy fighting on the German side and a Dutch female resistance member all end up involved in the Battle of the Scheldt. Their choices differ, but their goal is the same: freedom.

name: Fresh Off the Boat
summary_text: A Taiwanese family makes their way in America during the 1990s.

name: Oblivion
summary_text: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

name: Top Gear
summary_text: The hosts talk about everything car-related. From new cars to how they're fueled, this show has it all.

name: The Night House
summary_text: A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets.

name: Gran Torino
summary_text: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor, a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.

name: Marco Polo
summary_text: In a world replete with greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, "Marco Polo" is based on the famed explorer's adventures in Kublai Khan's court in 13th century Mongolia.

name: Jumanji
summary_text: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

name: Under Siege
summary_text: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

name: Sleeping Beauty
summary_text: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

name: The Ruins
summary_text: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

name: Red Notice
summary_text: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief.

name: The Gift
summary_text: A married couple, Simon and Robyn, run into Gordo, an old acquaintance. Things take a turn when Gordo begins to drop in unannounced at their house and inundates them with mysterious gifts.

name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
summary_text: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

name: The Three Musketeers
summary_text: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

name: Blade
summary_text: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

name: Excalibur
summary_text: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

name: Lifeforce
summary_text: A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

name: The Bureau
summary_text: After six years of undercover work in Syria, French intelligence officer Malotru returns home, where he struggles to forget his undercover identity, train a young recruit, and investigate when a colleague disappears in Algeria.

name: Hillbilly Elegy
summary_text: An urgent phone call pulls a Yale Law student back to his Ohio hometown, where he reflects on three generations of family history and his own future.

name: Akilla's Escape
summary_text: In a crime-noir about the urban child-soldier, Akilla Brown captures a fifteen-year-old Jamaican boy in the aftermath of an armed robbery. Over one gruelling night, Akilla confronts a cycle of generational violence he thought he escaped.

name: Love & Other Drugs
summary_text: In 1990s Pittsburgh, a medicine peddler starts a relationship with a young woman suffering from Parkinson's disease.

name: American Assassin
summary_text: After the death of his girlfriend at the hands of terrorists, Mitch Rapp is drawn into the world of counterterrorism, mentored by tough-as-nails former U.S. Navy S.E.A.L. Stan Hurley.

name: Karnan
summary_text: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

name: The Spanish Princess
summary_text: The beautiful Spanish princess, Catherine of Aragon, navigates the royal lineage of England with an eye on the throne.

name: The Death of Stalin
summary_text: Moscow, 1953. After being in power for nearly thirty years, Soviet dictator Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin (Adrian McLoughlin) takes ill and quickly dies. Now the members of the Council of Ministers scramble for power.

name: The Unhealer
summary_text: A botched faith healing bestows supernatural Shaman powers on a bullied teenager. When his lifelong tormentors pull a prank that kills someone he loves, he uses his powers for revenge and goes on a bloody rampage to settle the score.

name: Maleficent
summary_text: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

name: Hotel Transylvania
summary_text: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

name: Rosemary's Baby
summary_text: A young couple trying for a baby move into a fancy apartment surrounded by peculiar neighbors.

name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
summary_text: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.

name: Safe House
summary_text: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

name: Chef
summary_text: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.

name: Poltergeist
summary_text: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

name: True Grit
summary_text: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

name: Rear Window
summary_text: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
summary_text: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

name: Leave It to Beaver
summary_text: The misadventures of a suburban boy, family and friends.

name: Pearl Harbor
summary_text: A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.

name: Code Geass
summary_text: After being given a mysterious power to control others, an outcast prince becomes the masked leader of the rebellion against an all powerful empire

name: Evil Dead
summary_text: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

name: Colombiana
summary_text: A young girl in Bogotá witnesses her parents' murder and grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

name: Sucker Punch
summary_text: A young girl institutionalized by her abusive stepfather retreats to an alternative reality as a coping strategy and envisions a plan to help her escape.

name: The Intern
summary_text: Seventy-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.

name: Kinky Boots
summary_text: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.

name: In Time
summary_text: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

name: Abduction
summary_text: A young man sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

name: The Crow
summary_text: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

name: Willow
summary_text: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

name: Weekend at Bernie's
summary_text: Two losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

name: First Blood
summary_text: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

name: Reba
summary_text: Reba McEntire stars as the titular character in this smash sitcom about a single mom of three, navigating life in a Houston suburb.

name: Serenity
summary_text: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

name: Scoob!
summary_text: Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this dogpocalypse, the gang discovers that Scooby has an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

name: Best in Sex: 2017 AVN Awards
summary_text: Considered the industry's highest honor, the AVN Awards celebrates outstanding achievements in the world of adult entertainment in categories that recognize performers, directors, retailers...                See full summary »

name: Agent Carter
summary_text: In 1946, Peggy Carter is relegated to secretarial duties in the Strategic Scientific Reserve (SSR). When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis.

name: Underworld
summary_text: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

name: The Lives of Others
summary_text: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: Dickinson
summary_text: An inside look at the world of writer Emily Dickinson.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
summary_text: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

name: Clash of the Titans
summary_text: Perseus, demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

name: Enemy of the State
summary_text: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

name: Vacation
summary_text: Rusty Griswold takes his own family on a road trip to "Walley World" in order to spice things up with his wife and reconnect with his sons.

name: Lost in Translation
summary_text: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

name: Psycho Goreman
summary_text: After unearthing a gem that controls an evil monster looking to destroy the Universe, a young girl and her brother use it to make him do their bidding.

name: Sanditon
summary_text: About Charlotte Heywood, a spirited and impulsive woman who moves from her rural home to Sanditon, a fishing village attempting to reinvent itself as a seaside resort.

name: War of the Worlds
summary_text: An updated version of H.G Wells' seminal sci-fi classic about an alien invasion threatening the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

name: Skam
summary_text: The story of young teenagers and pupils on Hartvig Nissens upper secondary school in Oslo, and their troubles, scandals and everyday life. Each season is told from a different person's point of view.

name: Antebellum
summary_text: Successful author Veronica Henley finds herself trapped in a horrifying reality and must uncover the mind-bending mystery before it's too late.

name: Fantastic Four
summary_text: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

name: The Graduate
summary_text: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

name: Conan the Barbarian
summary_text: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

name: Rio
summary_text: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

name: Bonanza
summary_text: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

name: Three's Company
summary_text: The misadventures of two women and one man living in one apartment and their neighbors.

name: Martyrs
summary_text: A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.

name: Racket Boys
summary_text: A city kid is brought to the countryside by his father's new coaching gig; reviving a ragtag middle school badminton team on the brink of extinction.

name: Planet Earth II
summary_text: Wildlife documentary series with David Attenborough, beginning with a look at the remote islands which offer sanctuary to some of the planet's rarest creatures, to the beauty of cities, which are home to humans, and animals..

name: Memoirs of a Geisha
summary_text: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

name: Lolita
summary_text: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a fourteen-year-old nymphet.

name: Carrie
summary_text: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.
